document.text:
From: "  
To: 'IEllicnanJSANYS)“ 
Subject: Notes from 11/24/30 call with Dave Kelley 
Date: Tue, 24 Nov 2020 23:34:45 +0000 
• DK is one of the Dechert attorneys conducting the Apollo internal investigation regarding Leon Black's 
relationship with Epstein. Mandate is to understand what the relationship was between the two men and why 
Black was paying Epstein money. Looks to be Epstein was being paid for some reason other than the services he 
was providing. 
• DK reaching out to ask SDNY if there is anything available publicly that would shed any light on either Black's 
relationship with Epstein and/or Epstein's source of expertise to charge money. DK made clear he is not asking for 
SDNY to provide anything that is not public or would not be ordinarily accessible by third parties. 
• • indicated would check with team and get back to DK. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00017819
